Description (EN): Rotation direction of the rotor (rot_dir*N0, default value given by ROT_DIR_REF)
Class description: Input to start the electrical module with voltage input

Description (EN): Initial angular position of the rotor at t=0
Rotation direction of the stator phase (phase_dir*(n-1)*pi/qs, default value given by PHASE_DIR_REF)
Rotation direction of the stator currents (current_dir*2*pi*felec*time, default value given by CURRENT_DIR_REF)
True to compute voltage/currents only on one time periodicity (use periodicities defined in axes_dict[time])
True to compute voltage/currents only on one angle periodicity (use periodicities defined in axes_dict[angle])
True if machine is used as a generator
